subject: Brake pedal load cell failure
description_text:
i purchased a set of Plus X pedals on May 25, 2025 and they have been great
except recently the brake pedal is showing 36kg of force even when I'm
not applying any pressure. I have re calibrated multiple times. Is there
any way to replace the load cell or get a new brake pedal?

conversations.body_text: Hi Codythompson90,  Click the “Offset” button in the software to shift the white initial signal to 0%, and then perform the calibration again. This is necessary because adjusting the damping or mechanical components changes the initial position, so the Offset needs to be recalibrated for accurate readings.

After doing that it's reading 0 kg now, thank you.
